alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:18PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Prowers and northeastern Baca Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 218 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Springfield, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Walsh, Vilas and Two Buttes. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Springfield Vicinity, Baca County
